meanings.definition: Not open to appeal or challenge.
meanings.sent1: The judge's decision was unappealable, so we had to accept it.
meanings.sent2: The unappealable ruling brought an end to the court case.
meanings.sent3: It was unappealable that the sun would rise in the east every morning.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was unappealable, lighting up the room like a beacon.
meanings.sent5: The mountain stood unappealable, its peak reaching towards the sky.

meanings.definition: Final and unable to be changed.
meanings.sent1: The unappealable decision left no room for negotiation.
meanings.sent2: The contract was unappealable once both parties signed it.
meanings.sent3: The unappealable fact that cats hate water is well-known.
meanings.sent4: His unappealable resolve to finish the race earned him a medal.
meanings.sent5: The unappealable truth of the matter was evident to all who witnessed it.
